alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 03 at 2:27AM PST until February 03 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Areas of north to northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Coast and Los Angeles County Coast from Malibu to the Hollywood Hills. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways that could be impacted by the gusty winds include Highway 101 and Pacific Coast Highway.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast
